com.kuka.roboticsAPI.executionModel

Interface IPausableExecutionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IExecutionService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SunriseControllerExecutionService, TaskMotionExecutionService

    public interface IPausableExecutionService
extends IExecutionService
    Interface for an ExecutionService that can be paused.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPausableExecutionService.State
      Represent the state of the controller execution service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPauseListener(IPauseListener listener)
      Adds the specified pause event listener.
      void cancelPause()
      Cancels the pause state and resets the execution service.
      IRecovery getRecovery()
      Gets the recovery information to determine whether recovery is necessary to resume an application and then yes, how to recover.
      IPausableExecutionService.State getState()
      Returns the current execution service state.
      void removePauseListener(IPauseListener listener)
      Removes the specified pause event listener.
      boolean resumeExecution(ResumeMode mode)
      Resumes the paused execution.
      void startPause()
      Requests pausing of the execution.
      void waitForResumed()
      Blocks until the execution is resumed after calling resumeExecution(ResumeMode).
      boolean waitForResumed(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Blocks for the specified period until the execution is resumed after calling resumeExecution(ResumeMode).

      • Methods inherited from interface com.kuka.roboticsAPI.executionModel.IExecutionService

        addContainerQueuedListener, addExecutionListener, cancelAll, cancelAllOn, getExecutionMode, removeContainerQueuedListener, removeExecutionListener, setExecutionMode

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        IPausableExecutionService.State getState()
        Returns the current execution service state.
        Returns:
        execution service state

      • cancelPause

        void cancelPause()
        Cancels the pause state and resets the execution service.
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • startPause

        void startPause()
        Requests pausing of the execution.
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • addPauseListener

        void addPauseListener(IPauseListener listener)
        Adds the specified pause event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener for the pause events.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is null or the same listener is already registered by the execution service

      • removePauseListener

        void removePauseListener(IPauseListener listener)
        Removes the specified pause event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - execution event listener to remove.

      • getRecovery

        IRecovery getRecovery()
        Gets the recovery information to determine whether recovery is necessary to resume an application and then yes, how to recover.
        Returns:
        the recovery information

      • resumeExecution

        boolean resumeExecution(ResumeMode mode)
        Resumes the paused execution.
        Parameters:
        mode - specifies how execution should be resumed
        Returns:
        true, if execution could be resumed, false otherwise
        This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      • waitForResumed

        boolean waitForResumed(long timeout,
                       TimeUnit unit)
        Blocks for the specified period until the execution is resumed after calling resumeExecution(ResumeMode).
        Parameters:
        timeout - wait-time
        unit - time-unit
        Returns:
        true if wait succeeded, false if timeout

      • waitForResumed

        void waitForResumed()
        Blocks until the execution is resumed after calling resumeExecution(ResumeMode).
